AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: conducts roving stops and may temporarily detain vehicles for investigation, governed by the standard articulated in which dictates that agents may temporarily detain vehicles for investigation only if they are aware of specific articulable facts that reasonably warrant suspicion
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Government: prohibits unreasonable searches and seizures, involved in the prosecution of individuals and bears the burden of proving that stops were constitutional
